snippet: Football teams will now have to play at least one game each season against Notre Dame or a team from one of the four other major football conferences.
abstract: Big 12 Conference moves to improve schedule strength by requiring one annual nonconference game against Notre Dame or team from one of four other major conferences; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Football teams will now have to play at least one game each season against Notre Dame or a team from one of the four other major football conferences.
